Articles.Content:
It's the nearing of an end. The war has dragged on for over 6 years, and the United Kerbs of Kerica are making a weapon to force the Kerdonians into an unconditional surrender. The project is Project Kahnhatten, and the main goal is to create a bomb capable of decimating space centers with one hit. The code name for the bomb is the K-Bomb, and the Kerdonians don't understand it. The bomb is activated with fission where atoms get ripped apart and create huge energy. The scientists estimate just the shock wave will decimate a KSC and hopefully Kerdonia into surrendering. This is only a prototype and is still being tested and manufactured as of now. Here is a top-secret picture from[the government!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/#59272905).

![KslQxGo.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/KslQxGo.jpg)

We are working on a full on bomb with a proper uranium bullet to set it off. This project is top-secret and must not be shared with any other country. Any revealing of the bomb is a capital punishment and you will be stranded in space. This is a WIP, so[expect!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/#86526397) more variants in the passing days if this thread is kept alive, and I have the motivation to improve upon them. 

Ahh, the bomb itself, use it as you wish, modify it, and the such with this here link.

 [https://www.dropbox.com/s/jt5kgvr3etoqg8d/Project%20Kahnhatten.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/jt5kgvr3etoqg8d/Project%20Kahnhatten.craft?dl=0)

Go win some wars with this thing!

**K-29 Fully Equipped with Little Kerb!**

After a few weeks of intense engineering, the scientists have made a modified version of a K-29. It can carry a current model of the Little Kerb to almost anywhere on Kerbin, may it be a deserted island for testing, or a city full of military personal. The plane can fly as well as a normal K-29, but it is a major hazard. The best we could get is a at best mediocre plane. 1/3 takeoffs end in explosions and failures. 6 kerbals have sacrificed their lives for the greater good just from that. Another kerbal died from losing control using testing. I do not recommend this plane for people who hate dieing/killing many kebals. Everything else on this plane is great. Little Kerb separates like a stage on a rocket, great and with no hazards. Gliding is great. It can fly at 350 m/s top speed, with or without the bomb. It holds 4 kerbals to guarantee that every drop is successful. It controls amazingly and can almost point straight up. Ahh, the pictures. As last time, don't reveal it yada yada yada.
